help-file.title: "SHADOW MONSTER"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When cast, "Shadow Monster" creates one illusionary monster out of thin air that attacks the victim. The illusion will end when the victim dies or leaves the area for a time and if the caster dies or the duration of the spell ends. The illusion will also end after it has taken enough damage. ===========================================================================
# "SHADOW SHIELD" (Spell)
